name: Smash Remake
description:
Hi, I'm Sharksp3ar. And I have started development on an arena fighting game similar to super smash bros. This project is very early in development so a lot of key features aren't here yet. If you fall off the map (for now) you will have to press "R" to reset your position back to the platform. 2 player capability will hopefully be added soon.

- Sharksp3ar
